description.summary: Library with fts functions missing in musl libc (development files)
description.p: The musl-fts package implements the fts functions fts_open, fts_read, fts_children, fts_set and fts_close, which are missing in musl libc.
It uses the NetBSD implementation of fts to build a static library /usr/lib/libfts.a and the /usr/include/fts.h header file.
This package contains the development files.
